title: Sound On: Fed Goes Big, WH Targets Big Oil, Inflation
itunes:title: Sound On: Fed Goes Big, WH Targets Big Oil, Inflation
description:
Today's guests: Mitch Landrieu, senior advisor and infrastructure coordinator for President Biden and former mayor of New Orleans discusses the Biden administration's infrastructure plan and how to bring down high inflation, Euan Rellie, Co-founder and Managing Partner of BDA Partners discusses market reaction to the Fed's bold move to raise interest rates by 75 basis points, and panelists Morgan Ortagus, former State Dept Spokesperson and Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino discusses the results of Tuesday's primary elections, and President Biden's warning to Big Oil to boost supply. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
